channel.title: Woodcutting Adding Emote help!

item.title: Woodcutting Adding Emote help!
item.dc:creator: @pkforlol3 pkforlol3
item.description:
@pkforlol3 wrote:

hey i got this code added for woodcutting, it works too. BUT I ONLY PUT IN THE NORMAL TREE:

[code] /*

    WOODCUTTING

     */
  case 1276:
     // normal tree
    woodcutting[0] = 1;
    woodcutting[1] = 1;
    if (playerLevel[8] < 1) {
        woodcutting[2] = 82;
    }
     else if (playerLevel[8] >= 1) {
	addSkillXP(500, 8);
	sendMessage("You Cut The Logs.");
	addItem(1511, 1);
        woodcutting[3] = 100;
    }
    woodcutting[4] = 1511;
    break;

[/code]

How do i make it that when i cut the tree i get the woodcutting emote(875)?

something like this?

[code] /*

    WOODCUTTING

     */
  case 1276:
     // normal tree
    woodcutting[0] = 1;
    woodcutting[1] = 1;
    if (playerLevel[8] < 1) {
        woodcutting[2] = 82;
    }
     else if (playerLevel[8] >= 1) {
	addSkillXP(500, 8);
	sendMessage("You Cut The Logs.");
	addItem(1511, 1);
                      pEmote = 875;
        woodcutting[3] = 100;
    }
    woodcutting[4] = 1511;
    break;

[/code]

It doesnt work… where do i put the pEmote = 875???

someone please help…

Read full topic
